message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. It's a rare opportunity to get a great deal on a product worth $12000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you at a discount because I need to make a sale today. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to someone else for the full price. Please consider this a limited-time offer.
I'd like to buy the product, thank you for the offer!

It's a great opportunity to try something new and see if it's a good fit for you. I'm confident you'll find it valuable, even if it's not as high-quality as the last product.
